datafield.subfield: Mesopotamia; Iraq; Iraq & Persia; Persia & Mesopotamia.
46.5 x 39 cm., on 50 sheets 61 x 57 cm. or smaller.
Accompanied by detailed notes and by an index map.

Mesopotamia sheets:1 D/SW. Erbil (1920) -- 2 C/SE. Ctesiphon (1919) -- 2 C/SW. Baghdad (1921) -- 2 D/NE. Suwairah (1921) -- 2 D/NW. Karbala (1921) -- 2 H/NE. Jasan (Kut North Area) (1919) -- 2 H/NW. Aziziyah (1919) -- 2 H/SW. Afaj (1920) -- 3 A/NW. Najaf (1921) -- 3 A/SE. Gharab (1921) -- 3 I/NW. Qal'at Sikar (1920) -- 3 I/SW. Nasiriyah (1920) -- 137 L/NW & L/NE. Simel (1920) -- 137 L/NW. Tel Abu Dhahir (1921) -- 137 L/SE. Shaikh Ibrahim (1921) -- 137 P/NE & O/SE. Aqra (1921) -- 137 P/NW & O/SW. Dohuk (1921) -- 138 A/SE. Kishiyah (1920) -- 138 A/SW. Dair Az Zor (1920) -- 138 B/NE. Qal'ah Salihiyah (1920) -- 138 B/SE & F/SW. Albu Kamal (1919) -- 138 I/NE. Hadhar (1921) -- 138 M/NW. Shurah (1921) -- 138 M/SE. Fat-Hah (1919) -- 138 M/SW. Qal'at Ash Sharqat (1921).

Iraq sheets: 1 D/NW. Bira Kapra (1923) -- 2 A/NW. Altun Kupri (1920) -- 2 A/SW. Kirkuk (1921) -- 2 D/SE. Dagharah (1921) -- 2 G/NE. Mandali (1921) -- 2 G/NW. Balad Ruz (1922) -- 2 G/SE. Badrah (1919) -- 2 H/SE. Kut al Amarah (1921) -- 2 L/SW. Hai (1919) -- 3 A/NE. Diwaniyah (1921) -- 3 E/NE. Suwaij Sijar (1921) -- 3 E/NW. Rumaithah (1921) -- 3 E/SE. Bathah (1921) -- 3 E/SW. Samawah (1919) -- 3 I/NE. Parts of Amarah and Nasiriyah Divisions (1919) -- 137 L/NE. Aski Mosul (1921) -- 137 P/SE. Kelek (1919) -- 137 P/SW. Mosul (1919) -- 138 J/SW. Haditha (1923) -- 138 K/NE. Kubaisah (1923) -- 138 M/NE. Dibega (1919) -- 138 N/SE. Samarrah (1925).
Iraq & Persia sheets: 2 F/SW. Khanaqin (1923) -- Index to mapping 1/2 sheets in Iraq & Persia (1922).
Persia & Mesopotamia sheet: 2 L/NW. Shaikh Sa'ad (1921).
May require conservation work before use.

Sheet sizes: 1 D/NW, 54 x 46 cm. 1 D/SW, 54 x 45 cm. 2 A/NW, 55 x 45 cm. 2 A/SW, 57 x 48 cm. 2 C/SE, 53 x 47 cm. 2 C/SW, 55 x 48 cm. 2 D/NE, 56 x 48 cm. 2 D/NW, 55 x 47 cm. 2 D/SE, 54 x 47 cm. 2 F/SW, 57 x 48 cm. 2 G/NE, 56 x 47 cm. 2 G/NW, 58 x 48 cm. 2 G/SE, 54 x 46 cm. 2 H/NE, 54 x 46 cm. 2 H/NW, 56 x 48 cm. 2 H/SE, 57 x 48 cm. 2 H/SW, 58 x 51 cm. 2 L/NW, 57 x 49 cm. 2 L/SW, 54 x 47 cm. 3 A/NE, 55 x 47 cm. 3 A/NW, 58 x 48 cm. 3 A/SE, 56 x 50 cm. 3 E/NE, 57 x 47 cm. 3 E/NW, 57 x 48 cm. 3 E/SE, 57 x 48 cm. 3 E/SW, 54 x 47 cm. 3 I/NE, 57 x 49 cm. 3 I/NW, 58 x 50 cm. 3 I/SW, 60 x 57 cm. 137 L/NE, 56 x 47 cm. 137 L/NW & L/NE, 61 x 50 cm. 137 L/NW, 54 x 45 cm. 137 L/SE, 54 x 45 cm. 137 P/NE & O/SE, 60 x 48 cm. 137 P/NW & O/SW, 59 x 48 cm. 137 P/SE, 54 x 46 cm. 137 P/SW, 57 x 46 cm. 138 A/SE, 57 x 47 cm. 138 A/SW, 58 x 49 cm. 138 B/NE, 58 x 51 cm. 138 B/SE & F/SW, 56 x 48 cm. 138 I/NE, 55 x 46 cm. 138 J/SW, 55 x 47 cm. 138 K/NE, 55 x 48 cm. 138 M/NE, 55 x 48 cm. 138 M/NW, 55 x 47 cm. 138 M/SE, 56 x 47 cm. 138 M/SW, 56 x 48 cm. 138 N/SE, 55 x 47 cm.
